response.overview: "Children of the Algorithm" is a captivating 10-minute short documentary, employing a vérité-style approach to storytelling. Through a non-linear series of intimate conversations, viewers are taken on a journey where the subjects' perspectives seamlessly interweave, gradually revealing common themes that resonate across multiple viewpoints. By skillfully crafting a cohesive narrative from these diverse perspectives, the film offers a profound understanding of how this generation navigates the complexities of coming of age in our rapidly evolving world.
response.tagline: As young college students in Austin, Texas stand on the threshold of adulthood, this verite-style documentary portrays the distinct perspectives of this generation as they expresses their thoughts, feelings, and identity in the age of the internet.
response.title: Children of the Algorithm
